name: Fatui Conspiracy
description:
Create 1 Fatui Ambusher of a random type on the opponent's field.
(You must have at least 2 Fatui characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: Create 1 $[K1004] of a random type on the opponent's field.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3501}Fatui characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fatui Ambusher</color> of a random type on the opponent's field.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3501}Fatui characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: ...But none know the intricacies of what they are plotting.
